translations: 发生；存在于（occur 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: After May 19, strikes were occurring on a daily basis.
sentences.translation: 在5月19日以后，罢工每天都在发生。

sentences.sentence: It was noticed that this strange thing had been occurring every day latterly.
sentences.translation: 大家注意到，近来这种怪事天天都在发生。

sentences.sentence: Even more than mountainside slides of mud or snow, naturally occurring forest fires promote the survival of aspen trees.
sentences.translation: 自然发生的森林火灾甚至比山体滑坡或积雪更能促进白杨树的生长。
